tasks.name: Dependency Audit
tasks.prompt: Run npm audit and review package.json for outdated or vulnerable dependencies. Report any critical or high severity issues with recommended actions.

tasks.name: API Docs Sync
tasks.prompt: Compare the route definitions in src/routes/ against the API documentation. Flag any endpoints that are undocumented or where the docs don't match the implementation.

tasks.name: Dead Code Scan
tasks.prompt: Scan the codebase for unused exports, unreachable code, and unused variables. Report files and line numbers.
